question: ‘Tiger Triumph’ is the first ever tri services exercise of India with which country?
explanation: The first ever tri-services India-U.S.A. amphibious exercise titled \'Tiger Triumph\' is scheduled to be conducted from November 13 to 21. The exercise will be conducted off Visakhapatnam and Kakinada coasts in Andhra Pradesh. 1,200 Indian and 500 US soldiers, sailors and airmen will take part in the Exercise. The exercise will include events and field training that simulate moving a humanitarian assistance and disaster relief force from ship to shore.
